RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU'RE A DANDY quick to the lead, well handled throughout, stayed clear to the wire under good handling. DOGWOODS BECCA chased winner to the half, backed off, came back for place. LAYAWAY off rail run to far turn, chased from far turn with no late kick. FABULOUS PHILLY never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Dogwoods Becca
ENTRY.OWNER: Scott Anthony L Scott Chris L and Scott Mindy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the half, backed off, came back for place

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Philly
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: You're a Dandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the lead, well handled throughout, stayed clear to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Layaway
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to far turn, chased from far turn with no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 21, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: D'MONEY HONEY speed between horses, dueled to the turn, shook free and held sway to the wire. SAY IT AIN'T SO unhurried early, rallied to circle field into stretch for place. GEMO RAIN inside speed, dueled to the stretch, weakened in the drive. CUT GLASS no speed to the stretch, ran on with no late gain in the stretch. EMPEROR'S GOLD could not keep up with no response when needed. DELAYED ENGAGEMENT off rail run to the turn, could not go on and faded back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Emperor's Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Gemo Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dueled to the stretch, weakened in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: D'money Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses, dueled to the turn, shook free, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Say It Ain't So
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied to circle field into stretch for place

ENTRY.NAME: Cut Glass
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, ran on with no late gain in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Delayed Engagement
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to the turn, could not go on and faded back readily

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 21, 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 21, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRAUMARAMA good position to far turn, rallied into the stretch while all out to prevail. BELLE OF ST. JOHN between horses first turn while never far back, gained a short lead at rthe eighth pole but outkicked in the wire. LIVE IT UP saved ground to far turn, rallied along in the stretch for show. GENERAL GINNY off rail trip to far turn, went along evenly in the stretch run. C V THUNDER speed to the lead, held to quarter pole, gave in stretch run. SHESMYBROKER no speed throughout while never a menace. EIDA'S STORM off rail chase to the half with nothing left and faded back.

ENTRY.NAME: Live It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn, rallied along in the stretch for show

ENTRY.NAME: Eida's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail chase to the half with nothing left and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Belle of St. John
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses first turn, never far back, short lead, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: General Ginny
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow, off rail trip, went along evenly in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Shesmybroker
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed throughout while never a menace

ENTRY.NAME: C V Thunder
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the lead, held to quarter pole, gave in stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Traumarama
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn, rallied into stretch, all out prevail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKYINKENTUCKY well rated to far turn, asked for run and responded well to go well clear in the stretch run. FEELING IT dueled around the first turn, cleared off backstretch, no match. SHAKEM N BREAKEM inside trip throughout to move up readily for show spot. ARTEMUS EAGLE chased from off rail to far turn, weakened in the stretch run. DOWN HOME KITTEN never a factor throughout. CACAHUETE chased to the half, gave in readily thereafter. ALTERNATE NIGHTS never factored throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Cacahuete
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to the half, gave in readily thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Eagle
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased from off rail to far turn, weakened in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Luckyinkentucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated to far turn, asked for run, responded to go well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Shakem N Breakem
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip throughout to move up readily for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Alternate Nights
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Down Home Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a factor throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling It
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled around the first turn, cleared off backstretch, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this ra ce will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHO RUNS THE WORLD inside speed , dueled to the stretch, kicked clear to the wire. LOVE MY CANDY good position outside to quarter pole, rallied rapidly for place. CALLIE'S PASSION no speed to the turn,rallied widest into stretch for show spot. GOOD TURN good speed to duel, stayed to deep stretch, nailed for show spot. SAHARAN FLEECE saved ground to the turn, raced on evenly with no late kick. ARAYA tried to keep up but gave in readily into the stretch run. SHORT ON THE SUGAR through early and never menaced from the turn. TAPIT'S RUBY never menaced throughout. SOUTHERN MESA had an awkward start always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Short On the Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early and never menaced from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Callie's Passion
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn,rallied widest into stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Who Runs the World
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed , dueled to the stretch, kicked clear to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Saharan Fleece
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the turn, raced on evenly with no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Mesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: had an awkward start and always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Good Turn
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed to duel, stayed to deep stretch, nailed for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Tapit's Ruby
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position outside to quarter pole, rallied rapidly for place

ENTRY.NAME: Araya
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up but gave in readily into the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY TUESDAY sprung to the front quickly, set all pace under good handling. HIGH MEADOWS off mrail run to the quarter pole, rallied outside for place spot. ANCIENT BROWN rushed inside bid in the stretch to hold show spot at the wire. SHEZA HOOT never menaced throughout. ABOUNDING raced along evenly lacking a late kick when needed. FIVE QUEENS awkward from the gate and never menaced. DANCE ON OVER never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Hoot
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Lerios Virginia
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Ancient Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed inside bid in the stretch to hold show spot at the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Five Queens
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate and never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Abounding
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly lacking a late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Tuesday
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprung to the front quickly, set all pace under good handling

ENTRY.NAME: High Meadows
ENTRY.COMMENT: off mrail run to the quarter pole, rallied outside for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Dance On Over
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 21, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming P rice $16,000 (Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAMI CAT quick to the lead, well rationed throughout to hold sway to wire. PACHANGA LOCA good position from inside to turn while no match for winner and held place spot. BLEST LIFE pressed winner to the stretch, weakened in the final stages and just missed the place spot. PELLETIER raced along evenly with no late response when needed. TWIRLING RUTH lunged badly at the start and lost all chance while always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Pachanga Loca
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position from inside to turn, no match for winner, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Twirling Ruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged badly at the start, lost all chance

ENTRY.NAME: Cami Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the lead, well rationed throughout to hold sway to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Pelletier
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Blest Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner to stretch, weakened missed place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAPPYSECRET quick speed, opened up to the turn with all pace and held sway to the wire while eased up late. ISABEL DE CLARE broke slow from the gate, no speed to turn, rail run for place. AUGURI chased pace to the turn and weakened late for show spot. I'VE BEEN THINKIN no speed to the turn, late run to improve in the stretch run. HOP SNIP ANDA JUMP tried to keep up from inside to the stretch, faltered in drive. WILL VIRGINIA DARE through early, faltered back readily. TRANQUIL TIMES never threatened. CAPTIVE STAR never menaced throughout. KENTE KLARKE inside trip while fading back.

ENTRY.NAME: Happysecret
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed, opened up to the turn with all pace, eased up late

ENTRY.NAME: I've Been Thinkin
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, late run to improve in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Captive Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Kente Klarke
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip while fading back

ENTRY.NAME: Tranquil Times
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Isabel de Clare
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow from the gate, no speed to turn, rail run for place

ENTRY.NAME: Hop Snip Anda Jump
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up from inside to the stretch, faltered in drive

ENTRY.NAME: Auguri
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the turn and weakened late for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Will Virginia Dare
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, faltered back readily

RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGH WEEDS cruised past. PRINCESS BEACH late rush. RIII VICTORIO popped, caught. ZAN WAGON outgamed late. LUCKYJET weakened. RACIN FLEMINGS lunged, outrun. FAMOUS GHOST CASH outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Famous Ghost Cash
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun

ENTRY.COMMENT: popped, caught
